AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Discarded Vessel
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Being an imperfect vessel, [PAWN_nameDef] was discarded back into The Abyss. Somehow, they survived and managed to leave their birthplace.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Wanderer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: After escaping The Abyss, [PAWN_nameDef] wandered the rimworld aimlessly in search for a meaning. Stumbling upon maybe a colony or a tribe that they stuck to, or even attempting to survive on their own. Only time can tell how [PAWN_nameDef] will fare.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Wanderer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: After escaping The Abyss, [PAWN_nameDef] wandered the rimworld looking for a meaning. [PAWN_nameDef] eventually came across and stuck with a group of other wanderers and Vessels.
